item.description:
*PRANA FREE SPEAKER SERIES*
Judith Kravitz - Transformational Breathing
Tuesday, April 26th 6pm *RESCHEDULED* (Please stay tuned.)

Transformational Breathing is a powerful self-healing modality that works specifically with one’s own unique breathing pattern to allow more energy, better health, clear negativity in the subconscious, and reach higher levels of consciousness.

Judith Kravitz, is an ordained minister, doctor of metaphysics, and mother of eight. 35 years ago she healed herself of a cancerous tumor using the breath. Author of “Breathe Deep, Laugh Loudly," she travels worldwide teaching and training others to use Transformational Breath®. www.transformationalbreathing.com

Join the PRANA Family for this *FREE* and life-changing seminar.

*Please note: you will be able to purchase dinner at the restaurant during the event.

Save the date to HEAL and TRANSFORM:

April 26th at 6pm.

See you there.
Please bring a yoga mat or cushion as seating.

If not now, then when?

Feel free to print name tag and carpool.
http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametags/
item.how_to_find_us: Feel free to print name tag and carpool. www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametags
item.name: FREE Talk @ PRANA: Judith Kravitz *Rescheduled* Please stay tuned!
